document.full_text: yahoo inc has hired ken fuchs, an executive at time warner inc's time inc to oversee its sports, games and entertainment online properties, the company announced in an internal memo on tuesday.
document.title: yahoo taps time inc exec for sports, other units
lines_and_colors: yahoo inc has hired ken fuchs, an executive at time warner inc's time inc to oversee its sports, games and entertainment online properties, the company announced in an internal memo on tuesday.
